circumstances: After takeoff from Jacksonville-Executive at Craig Airport, while climbing in marginal weather conditions, the pilot-in-command lost control of the airplane that entered an uncontrolled descent and crashed. All three occupants were killed. The airplane was completing a special flight to Panama City on behalf of the Sheriff's office.
probable_cause:
Uncontrolled descent and subsequent collision with ground after the pilot suffered a spatial disorientation during climb to cruise. The following contributing factors were reported:
- lack of familiarity with aircraft,
- Low ceiling, 
- Fog.
